thread.title: Police try to ID Fairfax burglary suspects
thread.title_full: Police try to ID Fairfax burglary suspects - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Police try to ID Fairfax burglary suspects
text:
FAIRFAX, Vt. - Police say they are looking for two suspects in a Franklin County burglary.
Vermont State Police released images of the alleged suspects. Investigators say the men were caught on camera during the burglary, which occurred Wednesday afternoon in Fairfax.
They are asking the public to help identify the pair and the truck they were driving.
Anyone with information is asked to call Vermont State Police in St. Albans at 802-524-5993.
